Title: Web Feed Generator
Description:
The Web Feed Generator project provides an easy way to add web feeds to your ASP.Net web site.

The Web Feed Generator takes care of all the web feed related plumbing, the only thing that needs to be done to add a web feed is to Implement the interface IWebFeedDataLoader to provide data to the feed.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Web Feed Generator project provides an easy way to add web feeds to your ASP.Net web site.

The Web Feed Generator takes care of all the web feed related plumbing, the only thing that needs to be done to add a web feed is to Implement the interface IWebFeedDataLoader to provide data to the feed.



Features

  • Support for RSS, Atom, Podcast
  • Easy to implement
  • Configurable feed url's in the web.config


Web Feed Generator makes use of the open source projects log4net and Spring.Net



Orbit One is a software development agency located in Ghent Belgium.
We specialize in internet facing websites, intranet and extranet applications.
We use technologies such as ASP.Net, SharePoint, Umbraco and Microsoft Dynamics CRM.
